card.note: Mrs. Johnson is nice. She lets us go out to recess early and stay out longer. She also gets chicks in her classroom.
card.author: Danny

card.note: The thing I love most about Theresa is that she shares personal stories with the kids about her past, her family, etc. It's nice of the kids to relate to her as a former student, mom and wife - not just an authority figure.
card.author: Maggie Smith

card.note: I love that Mrs. Johnson puts as much into helping build good character as she does in helping the kids learn.
card.author: Shelby Kraemer

card.note: Mrs. Johnson helped me learn more than I ever did before and she was the best teacher ever.
card.author: Chase Kraemer

card.note: I like that we made books for Mother's Day and Father's Day. I also like that when I got in trouble she would always talk it out with me to make sure I didn't do it again.
card.author: Chase Kraemer

card.note: Mrs. Johnson is great because she makes sure we have the most fun and do cool projects, like the baby chicks she brought into class.
card.author: Jimmy

card.note: Theresa is wonderful, enthusiastic, caring and patient. She gets to know each child and supports their individuality and personal needs. We feel like we hit the teacher lottery!!
card.author: Amanda (Jimmy's mom)

card.note: Mrs. Johnson is the sweetest teacher.
card.author: Lauren

card.note: I love that Theresa and I share a love for Diet Coke any time of the day, no rules!
card.author: Lauren's mom

card.note: I liked having you because you are an amazing teacher. You were so nice to us.
card.author: Sierra

card.note: The Miller family feel so fortunate to have had you this year. Sierra looked forward to going to school every day to be with you.
card.author: Lynn and Mike (Sierra's parents)

card.note: We loved volunteering in your class and watching you make learning so much fun. Thank you for a great year. You made it special.
card.author: Lynn and Mike (Sierra's parents)

card.note: I love that Mrs. Johnson plans stuff for us to learn about. I loved when we had the baby chicks in our class. Mrs. Johnson taught us how they hatch and how to hold them.
card.author: Ben

card.note: We love the way Mrs. Johnson always looks for - and sees - the best in Ryan.
card.author: Mary and Anthony (Ryan's parents)

card.note: I love Mrs. Johnson because she's funny (but not at the wrong time)!
card.author: Ryan

card.note: Mrs. Johnson is willing to talk things out. She makes learning fun. She has everything you need to be a great teacher and she is one.
card.author: Landon

card.note: My favorite thing about Mrs. Johnson is that she has been so nice and helpful to me. Thank you for a great year, Mrs. Johnson
card.author: Riley

card.note: Thank you Mrs. Johnson and have a great summer.
card.author: Nathan

card.note: I love Mrs. Johnson because she helps us with problems.
card.author: Charlie

card.note: I love Mrs. Johnson because she challenges our children.
card.author: Jennifer (Charlie's mom)

card.note: It has been a fabulous year with you. I bet the kids next year will really enjoy your teaching because you're so good. Have a good summer.
card.author: Zach

card.note: I love Mrs. Johnson because she's really nice. I love Mrs. Johnson because she does things that other teachers don't do, like have baby chicks in class.
card.author: Sophia

card.note: Mrs. Johnson is special because she lets us have chicks and butterflies and movie parties. She is awesome!
card.author: Luca

card.note: Mrs. Johnson is a wonderful teacher who created a classroom filled with learning, laughter and love.
card.author: DJ

card.note: I appreciate how Mrs. Johnson recognizes the children's accomplishments.
card.author: Sonia (DJ's mom)

card.note: When I came in the fall she already knew me and gave me a big hug. We did so many fun activities like the wax museum, the chicks and Chinese Feast. Mr. Johnson looks pretty every day. I loved being in her class.
card.author: Sophia

card.note: When I came in the fall she already knew me and gave me a big hug. We did so many fun activities like the wax museum, the chicks and Chinese Feast. Mr. Johnson looks pretty every day. I loved being in her class.
card.author: Sophia
